a.n: Gennaro Manna - Arias in World Premiere

p.k: As the son of one of Naples' most prominent musical families Gennaro Manna was blessed with a pen both versatile and skilled. And as an icon of the Neapolitan opera seria, with his lively and galant style of music, he trod the path between Baroque and pre-Classical. Abchordis Ensemble performs the world premiere of his finest arias, alternated with instrumental works by Durante, Porpora and Santangelo.
